concept.title: What can this edition be used for?
concept.shortdesc: This edition can be used for out-of-the-box authoring; it also can be used to develop specializations for fields other than technical content or learning and training.

conbody.p: Examples of such specializations might include the following:

ul.li: Media topic that contains a title, metadata, an image or video, and a caption
Information about when to call a doctor
A topic that is designed to hold cover-page information for a basic publication
Event listing for an online calendar
